subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] A powerful software implementing a Spectrum Analyzer, Oscilloscope, Frequency
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Don't forget to look at the spectral display, as images are sometimes seen
in EVP sounds. Sometimes there is images in just white noise, recorded at
haunted areas.

F-S
